name: htmlCodeFormat
description:
Replaces special characters in a string with their HTML-escaped
 equivalents and inserts &ltpre> and &lt/pre&gt tags at the beginning
 and end of the string.
 [version]
 HTML version to use. currently ignored.
 -1: The latest implementation of HTML
 2.0: HTML 2.0 (Default)
 3.2: HTML 3.2

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code: <cfset testString="This is a test & this is another <This text is in angle brackets> Previous line was blank!!!">   <cfoutput>#htmlCodeFormat(testString)#</cfoutput>
